H0.text: Which English king was the first to establish a regular navy. Edward I

H1.text: Which English king was the first to establish a regular navy. Henry VIII

H2.text: Which English king was the first to establish a regular navy. Richard I

H3.text: Which English king was the first to establish a regular navy. Ã†Lfred

A4.text: He founded the Royal Navy, oversaw the annexation of Wales to England with the Laws in Wales Acts 1535 and 1542, and was the first English monarch to rule as King of Ireland following the Crown of Ireland Act 1542.

A5.text: Henry was also responsible for the creation of a permanent navy, with the supporting anchorages and dockyards.
